android.widget.BaseAdapter

Packages that use BaseAdapter
android.preference Provides classes that manage application preferences and implement the preferences UI. 
android.webkit Provides tools for browsing the web. 
android.widget The widget package contains (mostly visual) UI elements to use on your Application screen.

Subclasses of BaseAdapter in android.webkit
static class TextDialog.AutoCompleteAdapter
          This is a special version of ArrayAdapter which changes its text size to match the text size of its host TextView.
 

Uses of BaseAdapter in android.widget
 

Subclasses of BaseAdapter in android.widget
 class ArrayAdapter<T>
          A ListAdapter that manages a ListView backed by an array of arbitrary objects.
 class CursorAdapter
          Adapter that exposes data from a Cursor to a ListView widget.
(package private)  class ExpandableListConnector
          A BaseAdapter that provides data/Views in an expandable list (offers features such as collapsing/expanding groups containing children).
 class ResourceCursorAdapter
          An easy adapter that creates views defined in an XML file.
 class SimpleAdapter
          An easy adapter to map static data to views defined in an XML file.
 class SimpleCursorAdapter
          An easy adapter to map columns from a cursor to TextViews or ImageViews defined in an XML file.
